Weapon.name: Champion of Graves
Weapon.description: This +5 bardiche deals additional 3d6 negative energy damage.

Weapon.name: Rod of Razors
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 keen adamantine halberd. As a standard action, up to five times per day, Rod can fire razors, dealing 20d6 slashing damage to all creatures in a 30-foot cone (DC27 Reflex half).

Weapon.name: Ravena's Kiss
Weapon.description: This +5 adamantine bastard sword grants its wielder the ability to cast harm spell 3 times per day as an 11th level cleric.

Weapon.name: Martyr's Blade
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 axiomatic holy vicious bastard sword.

Weapon.name: Opperssor
Weapon.description: This +4 bastard sword grants its wielder a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma, and a +2 luck bonus on Will saving throws.

Weapon.name: Unstoppable Khanda
Weapon.description: This Khanda is a +4 Bastard Sword that gives its wielder a +4 bonus on Persuasion checks, DR 5/piercing, and a +8 bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects. Creatures hit by the Khanda must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude saving throw or be affected by poison for 6 rounds. Poison deals 1d2 Wisdom damage and dazed a target for 1 round.

Weapon.name: Frost Blade
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +3 Freezing battleaxe.

Weapon.name: Earth's Wrath
Weapon.description: This +3 battleaxe grants its wielder the ability to cast inspiring recovery two times per day.

Weapon.name: Serrator
Weapon.description: This wounding battleaxe deals 1 point of bleed damage when it hits a creature. Multiple bleeding effects stack. Bleeding creatures take the bleed damage at the start of their turns. Bleed will continue until the target receives magic healing of leaves combat. A critical hit does not multiply the bleed damage. Creatures immune to critical hits are immune to the bleed damage dealt by this weapon.

Weapon.name: Grim Finale
Weapon.description: Whenever this +2 necrotic club lands a successful critical hit, it casts vampiric touch spell on its target. Whenever the wielder unequip this weapon, it cast finger of death on them.

Weapon.name: Hunter's Blessing
Weapon.description: This +5 holy composite longbow grants its wielder a +4 sacred bonus to Dexterity.

Weapon.name: Gamekeeper of the First World
Weapon.description: This +5 composite Longbow has 19-20 critical range. Whenever it lands a hit, the target becomes illuminated for 3 rounds, preventing it from using Invisibility, inflicting a -50 penalty on Stealth checks and a -4 to AC.

Weapon.name: Mirror Bow
Weapon.description: Whenever the wielder of this +5 composite longbow uses it to attack an enemy, Mirror Bow also shoots a reflection arrow at the same target. Reflection arrow is a ranged attack that deals 1d4 + half the wielder's Strength bonus piercing damage.

Weapon.name: Watchman
Weapon.description: This +5 holy composite longbow grants its wielder blindsense.

Weapon.name: Shady Longbow
Weapon.description: This +3 composite longbow grants its wielder a +5 luck bonus to Stealth skill checks, and the ability to cast invisibility spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Legacy of Accursed Tree
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 composite longbow.

Weapon.name: Devourer of Metal
Weapon.description: This +1 longbow deals 2d6 damage, and additional 2d6 acid damage, yet its clumsiness and weight impose a -2 penalty on the wielder's attack rolls.

Weapon.name: Lucky Longbow
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 composite longbow.

Weapon.name: Whirlwind
Weapon.description: This +2 composite longbow grants its wielder a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, and the ability to summon a medium air elemental once per day.

Weapon.name: Longbow of Erastil
Weapon.description: This longbow deals additional 1d4 damage to animals and undead creatures.

Weapon.name: Prowling Cat
Weapon.description: This +4 speed composite shortbow is decorated with a carving of a hunting cat. It grants its wielder the ability to summon 1d4+1 smilodons three times per day.

Weapon.name: Fiery Eye
Weapon.description: This +1 flaming composite shortbow grants its wielder the ability to cast flare burst spell three times per day.

Weapon.name: Dormition
Weapon.description: This +5 undead bane dagger grants its wielder a +2 bonus to death effect's DCs and saving throws against them, and deals additional 1d6 positive energy damage.

Weapon.name: Deceiver
Weapon.description: This +3 agile dagger has its reach increased by 5 feet. It grants its wielder a +5 luck bonus on all Stealth skill check, and the ability to cast displacement spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Edict
Weapon.description: Whenever this +4 mithral speed dagger lands a hit, it imposes a -3 penalty to target's Will score for 1 minute.

Weapon.name: Dark Wind
Weapon.description: This +4 dagger grants its wielder a +5 bonus to Stealth skill checks and increases sneak attack damage with any weapon by 1d6 damage.

Weapon.name: Chaos Shard
Weapon.description: This +2 dagger has a chance to confuse enemy on a hit.

Weapon.name: Frailty
Weapon.description: This +1 ghost touch dagger grants its wielder the ability to cast bestow curse (curse of weakness) spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Troublemaker
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 flaming anarchic agile dagger.

Weapon.name: Arcane Protector
Weapon.description: This +1 dagger grants its wielder a +3 dodge bonus to AC and immunity to nauseated condition.

Weapon.name: Lightsning Duelist
Weapon.description: This +1 dagger grants its wielder a +4 insight bonus to Initiative rolls and +1 dodge bonus to AC. Attacks with it deal additional 1d6 lightning damage.

Weapon.name: Bloodhound
Weapon.description: This +5 speed agile dueling sword has a 18-20 critical range. Each successful hit it lands on an enemy grants its wielder a stacking +2 bonus to all subsequent damage rolls with Bloodhound against this enemy.

Weapon.name: Menace
Weapon.description: This +3 brilliant energy dueling sword grants its wielder a +2 luck bonus sto CMD and a +2 luck bonus to CMB.

Weapon.name: Arcane Enforcer
Weapon.description: This +3 dueling sword deals additional 1d6 damage.

Weapon.name: Swordsman's Passion
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 agile dueling sword.

Weapon.name: Royal Gift
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +3 keen dueling sword.

Weapon.name: Lord Protector
Weapon.description: This +2 dueling sword refuses to attack the ones its wearer swore to protect, imposing a -5 penalty to attack rolls against friendly targets.

Weapon.name: Opportunist's Dwarven Waraxe
Weapon.description: This +1 speed dwarven waraxe deals additional 9 damage on a successful critcal hit and grants its wielder the ability to cast flare spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Obliteration
Weapon.description: Whenever this +5 vicious earthbreaker lands a hiton an enemy, it applies a stacking -2 AC penalty to the target. This penalty disappears once the battle ends.

Weapon.name: Bane of the Living
Weapon.description: This +5 elven curve blade is a bane weapon against creature of every type except undead and constructs. Whenever it lands a critical hit, it has a chance to cast harm spell (DC22) on the target.

Weapon.name: Clarity
Weapon.description: This +4 ghost touch magical beast bane elven curve blade grants its wielder a +2 luck bonus to attack rolls.

Weapon.name: Lifestopper
Weapon.description: This +4 keen speed estoc grants its wielder the ability to cast waves of fatigue spell once per day

Weapon.name: Blinding Light
Weapon.description: This +5 estoc has a x3 critical multiplier. Whenever it lands a critical hit, it has a chance to blind the target.

Weapon.name: Forsaken Edge
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 unholy estoc.

Weapon.name: Hairsplitter
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 agile estoc.

Weapon.name: Fervent Edge
Weapon.description: This +3 furious brass falcata grants its wielder the ability to cast righteous might spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Decapitator
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 keen falcata.

Weapon.name: Odium
Weapon.description: This +5 unholy anarchic falchion gives its wielder a +6 enhancement bonus to natural armor, but reduce their Charisma score to 1.

Weapon.name: Beastrender
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 animal bane falchion.

Weapon.name: Fury's Legacy
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 furious falchion.

Weapon.name: Mastery
Weapon.description: This +5 fauchard grants its wielder continuous effect of freedom of movement spell, immunity to trip and bull rush combat maneuvers, and a +5 enhancement bonus to CMB. Whenever the wielder succussfully performs a combat maneuver, Mastery also deals damage to its target as if it landed a hit.

Weapon.name: Serpent Prince
Weapon.description: This +3 corrosive fauchard has a higher critical hit multiplier.

Weapon.name: Dark Bidding
Weapon.description: This +3 necrotic fauchard grants its wielder the ability to cast animate dead spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Tyrant
Weapon.description: Each time this +5 flail lands a hit, it applies a stacking -1 penalty to target's AC, all saving throws and CMD.

Weapon.name: Incurruptible Petal
Weapon.description: This +5 holy glaive deals an additional 2d6 sonic damage. It also grants its wielder the ability to cast heroic invocation once per day as a 17th level wizard.

Weapon.name: Dragon's Essence
Weapon.description: This +5 dragon bane greataxe grants its wielder the ability to cast dragonkind III spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Vanquisher
Weapon.description: This +5 greataxe has a critical range of 19-20, and deals additional 10 damage on every hit.

Weapon.name: Lava Forged Axe
Weapon.description: This +5 bleed greataxe deals additional 2d8 damage. It grants its wielder ability to cast summon huge fire elemental spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Destroyer
Weapon.description: This +5 anarchic unholy vicious greataxe has a x4 critical multiplier.

Weapon.name: Retribution
Weapon.description: This +4 flaming magic beast bane greataxe grants its wielder the ability to cast eaglesoul spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Tempest
Weapon.description: This +3 speed shock greataxe grants its wielder the ability to cast remove paralysis spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Frost Touch
Weapon.description: This +3 frost fey bane greataxe grants its wielder the ability to cast resist cold spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Heat of Battle
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +3 flaming greataxe.

Weapon.name: Second Execution
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 undead bane greataxe.

Weapon.name: Extinguisher
Weapon.description: This +2 greataxe works as a +6 weapon against Will-o'-Wisps.

Weapon.name: Capital Punishment
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 axiomatic keen greataxe.

Weapon.name: Trollreaper
Weapon.description: This +1 greataxe deals additional 1d6 acid damage.

Weapon.name: Bloodthirst
Weapon.description: This +5 greatclub deals additional 2d6 negative energy damage on a hit, and has a chance to cast vampiric touch on a critical hit. It can only be used by evil characters.

Weapon.name: Spinebreaker
Weapon.description: This +3 unholy greatclub grants its wielder immunity to boneshaker and boneshatter spells. It has an improved critical range 19-20 (does not stack with other effects that enhance the critical range). Whenever it lands a critical hit, it has a chance to cast boneshatter spell at the target.

Weapon.name: The Crusher
Weapon.description: This +2 large greatclub appears surprisingly light in your hand. Its size penalty for Medium creatures is reduced to -2.

Weapon.name: Endless War
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 vicious greatsword.

Weapon.name: Remnant
Weapon.description: This +5 flaming greatsword deals additional 2d6 divine damage on hit. If its wielder is good, and its target is evil, it deals additional 3d6 divine damage instead.

Weapon.name: Swift Blow
Weapon.description: This +4 shock greatsword grants its wielder the ability to cast umbral strike spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Stonekeeper
Weapon.description: This +2 corrosive greatsword grants its wielder the ability to cast pike stones spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Fly Swatter
Weapon.description: This +1 greatsword grants its wielder a +4 bonus on all saving throws against poison, and deals an additional 1d8 damage against vermin.

Weapon.name: Stonecutter
Weapon.description: This +5 adamantite construct bane handaxe grants its wielder DR 5/ bludgeoning.

Weapon.name: Elemental Squall
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +3 flaming frost shock corrosive heavy crossbow.

Weapon.name: Ankle Breaker
Weapon.description: This +1 crossbow has a chance to slow the enemy on hit.

Weapon.name: Myth Slayer
Weapon.description: This +5 heavy crossbow deals 2d10 damage on hit. If its target has one of the following qualities: Huge or Gargantuan size; 20 or more HD, it inflicts a single -2 penalty to wielder's attack rolls, but adds 1d10 to damage for each of the qualities the target has.

Weapon.name: The End
Weapon.description: This +5 anarchic vicious heavy flail deals divine damage instead of physical, bypassing any damage reduction, resistance or immunity the target may possess.

Weapon.name: Overthrow
Weapon.description: If the wielder of this +5 speed flail has the Trip feat, each round the first successful hit it lands also attempts to trip the target.

Weapon.name: Eradicator
Weapon.description: This +4 unholy mace grants its wielder the ability to cast slay living spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Authority
Weapon.description: This unholy heavy mace +5 grants its wielder fire immunity and a +5 bonus on Persuasion skill checks. On a successfuls hit, the target must succeed on DC 21 Fortitude check or be set on fire for 1d4 rounds (2d6 fire damage) and become nauseated for 1 round.

Weapon.name: Alkaline Mace
Weapon.description: This +2 corrosive heavy mace allows its wearer to throw an acid bomb three times per day. Acid bombs launched from this mace deals 3d6+5 acid damage on a direct hit.

Weapon.name: Sovereign
Weapon.description: Whenever the wielder of this +5 heavy mace successfully hits a new target for the first time, it grants them a stacking +1 bonus to AC, attack rolls, and all saving throws until the end of the battle.

Weapon.name: Mallet of Woe
Weapon.description: This +3 heavy mace deals 2d6 damage and grants its wielder the continuous effect of freedom of movement spell.

Weapon.name: Executioner
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 human bane morningstar.

Weapon.name: Righteous Punishment
Weapon.description: This +4 heavy mace gains a +4 bonus to attack rolls agianst the targets affected by Smite Evil or Mark of Justice effects.

Weapon.name: Skullcrusher
Weapon.description: Whenever this +2 heavy mace lands a critical hit, the target needs to succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 17) or become stunned for 1d4 rounds. If the saving throw is successful, the target is staggered for 1 round instead.

Weapon.name: Terror Bringer
Weapon.description: This +2 heavy mace grants its wielder the ability to cast boneshaker spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Kneesplitter
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 giant bane heavy pick.

Weapon.name: Demolisher
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 adamantine construct bane heavy pick.

Weapon.name: Eye of the Tornado
Weapon.description: This +3 shock light repeating crossbow grants its wielder a +2 luck bonus to Initiative, and the ablilty to cast summon medium air elemental spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Monastic Kama
Weapon.description: This +3 kama has a chance to blind the opponent on a successful hit and grants its wielder the ability to cast molten orb spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Persector
Weapon.description: This +2 shock kama grants its wielder the ability to cast thundering drums spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Monastic Kama
Weapon.description: This +2 kama grants its wielder a +2 dodge bonus to AC.

Weapon.name: Talon of the Wise
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 agile kama.

Weapon.name: Weasel's Bite
Weapon.description: This +5 kukri has a x3 critical multiplier. Whenever a creature is hit by it for the first time during a combat, it deals an additional 6d6 damage.

Weapon.name: Weasel's Claw
Weapon.description: This +5 kukri has a x3 critical multiplier. Whenever a creature is hit by it for the first time during a combat, it deals an additional 6d6 damage.

Weapon.name: Cold Blood
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +4 freezing Kukri.

Weapon.name: Fiery Blood
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +4 incinerating Kukri

Weapon.name: Swift Injustice
Weapon.description: This +4 Kukri deals additional 2 damage to helpless targets.

Weapon.name: Gift of Death
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 unholy kukri.

Weapon.name: Mother's Care
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 frost keen kukri.

Weapon.name: Mother's Warmth
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 flaming keen kukri.

Weapon.name: Ovinrbaane, Enemy of All Enemies
Weapon.description:
The soul within the Ovinrbaane can manipulate reality around its wielder, allowing them to cast a mall assortment of spells from Abjuration and Transmutation schools.
Each round in combat the wielder of Ovinrbaane risks falling under its influence and losing control over their actions. Each round the wielder must succeed on a Will saving throw (DC23) or begin attacking the closest target. Each round afterwards the wielder can make another saving throw to regain control. For every successful saving throw against this influence, the DC of subsequent saving throws is increased by 1 until the end of the combat.

Weapon.name: Graveyard of Giants
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 furious greater frost oversized bastard sword. It doesn't impose the regular size penalty on the wielder.

Weapon.name: Lawbringer
Weapon.description: This +5 axiomatic light crossbow ends the barbarian's Rage on hit.

Weapon.name: Escapist's Crossbow
Weapon.description: This +3 speed shock light crossbow grants its wielder the ability to cast dimension door spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Planar Hunter
Weapon.description: +3 outsider bane brilliant energy light crossbow.

Weapon.name: Greater Sting
Weapon.description: This +2 corrosive light crossbow deals an extra 1d6 points of acid damage on a successful hit and has critical hit multiplier x3.

Weapon.name: Torpor
Weapon.description: This +1 light hammer has a 19-20/x3 critical range. On a successful critical hit it has a chance to stun the enemy.

Weapon.name: Malice
Weapon.description: This +5 vicious mithral light mace has 19-20/ x2 critical range and deals bludgeoning, slashing and piercing damage.

Weapon.name: Highwayman's Argument
Weapon.description: This +4 light mace grants its wielder a +5 morale bonus to Persuasion skill checks when used to intimidate. It deals additional 2d6 damage against frightened targets and 1d6 damage against shaken targets (these effects do not stack with each other).

Weapon.name: Violent Mischief
Weapon.description: Whenever this +4 light mace deals sneak attack damage, it's increased by 1d6.

Weapon.name: Elemental Punisher
Weapon.description: This +5 speed longbow deals additional 1d6 electricity damage, 1d6 fire damage, 1d6 acid damage, and 1d6 sonic damage. It has 19-20 critical range. Whenever it lands a hit, it has a chance to blind target for 1d3 rounds (DC24).

Weapon.name: Nobleman's Amusement
Weapon.description: This +1 longbow grants its wielder the effect of Point-Blank Shot and Precise Shot feats.

Weapon.name: Singing Edge
Weapon.description: Whenever the wielder of this +3 longspear becomes affected by bardic performance, its enhancement bonus increases to +3, and it grants its wielder a +2 dodge bonus to AC.

Weapon.name: Dragonslayer
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 dragonbane longspear.

Weapon.name: Redeemer
Weapon.description: This +5 holy flaming longsword has an improved critical multiplier. It grants its wielder the ability to cast transformation spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Light of Valor
Weapon.description: This +5 holy axiomatic longsword grants its wielder the ability to cast searing light spell as a 10th level cleric at will.

Weapon.name: Unbound Blade
Weapon.description: This +4 shock longsword grants its wielder a +4 bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

Weapon.name: Perfection
Weapon.description: This +5 longsword grants its wielder a +2 inherent bonus to AC, all saving throws, attack rolls and skill checks.

Weapon.name: Sword of Eternal Servitude
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 holy longsword.

Weapon.name: Rageclaw
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 adamantine furious longsword.

Weapon.name: Faterender
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5/+5 double axe. Whenever its first blade lands a hit, it marks the target for an execution. Whenever the second blade hits a marked target, it removes the mark and deals additional 1d10 + wielder's Strength modifier damage.

Weapon.name: Silent Whisperer
Weapon.description: This +5 shock agile dagger grants its wielder the ability to cast harm spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Prehistoric Tooth
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +4 necrotic burst punching dagger.

Weapon.name: Trouble Solver
Weapon.description: This +2 frost agile speed dagger has a chance to slow an enemy on a successful hit.

Weapon.name: The Call
Weapon.description: This +4 quarterstaff grants its wielder the ability to cast summon monster VIII spell twice per day, and glitterdust spell at will.

Weapon.name: Twin Serpents
Weapon.description: This +5 quarterstaff deals force damage. Whenever its wielder casts spells with force descriptor, they deal +2 damage per dice. It also grants its wielder the ability to cast empowered magic missile spell at will.

Weapon.name: Ruin
Weapon.description:
Whenever this +5 quarterstaff lands a hit, it deals additional 2d6 force damage.
If Ruin's wielder is chaotic, it grants them a +4 bons to spell penetration.
If Ruin's wielder is lawful, it grants them a +6 bons on concentration checks.
If Ruin's wielder is neutral, it grants them a +2 bons to spell penetration and a +3 bonus on concentration checks.

Weapon.name: Black Raven's Staff
Weapon.description: This +3 quarterstaff grants its wielder the ability to cast waves of fatigue spell three times per day, and ray of enfeeblement spell at will.

Weapon.name: The Undaunted
Weapon.description: This +4 flaming aberration bane quarterstaff grants its wielder a +3 morale bonus on Persuasion skill checks when used to intimidate, and the ability to cast remove paralysis spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Burned Oak
Weapon.description: This +2 quarterstaff grants its wielder the ability to cast fire snake spell twice per day, and burning hands spell at will.

Weapon.name: Prowling Cheetah
Weapon.description: This +1 speed quarterstaff grants its wielder the ability to cast feather step (mass) spell three times per day.

Weapon.name: Rigid Oak Staff
Weapon.description: This +2 quarterstaff grants its wielder a +4 morale bonus to Constitution, a +2 morale bonus on Fortitude saving throws, and the ability to cast resist sonic spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Crimson Counselor
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 quarterstaff.

Weapon.name: Will of the Dsciple
Weapon.description: This +1 axiomatic quarterstaff is capable of delivering heavy stunning strikes upon the enemy.

Weapon.name: Black Salt
Weapon.description: This +5 vicious rapier deals 2 damage to a random ability on hit. It can't reduce any ability score below 7.

Weapon.name: Satisfaction
Weapon.description: Each time an enemy lands a hit on the wielder of this +5 anarchic mithral rapier, it gains a stacking +2 bonus to damage rolls until the end of the battle.

Weapon.name: Revelry
Weapon.description: This +5 holy anarchic rapier grants its wielder the continuous effect of freedom of movement spell, and immunity to fear and death effect.

Weapon.name: Putrid Blade
Weapon.description: This +3 corrosive agile rapier grants its wielder acid resistance 20 and the ability to cast spit venom spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Deadly Grace
Weapon.description: When this +1 keen agile rapier lands a hit, its target must succeed on a Fortitude saving throw (DC 15) or become affected by acid that deals 2d4 damage every round for 3 rounds.

Weapon.name: Vein Finder
Weapon.description: Whenever this +3 agile rapier lands a hit, it makes the target bleed for 1d6 HP per round. Bleed will continue until the target receives magic healing or leaves combat. It also grants its wielder the ability to cast cure moderate wounds spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Tears of Blood
Weapon.description: This +5 keen agile sai has a chance to stun the opponent on a successful hit and grants its wielder the ability to cast sirocco spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Steelwind
Weapon.description: This +3 improved speed sai grants its wielder 2 additional attacks per rounds.

Weapon.name: Heart Piercer
Weapon.description: This +3 agile sai grants its wielder a +2 luck bonus on Initiative rolls. Whenever it lands a hit, it makes the target bleed for 1d6 HP per round. Bleed will continue until the target receives magic healing or leaves combat.

Weapon.name: Blade of the Merciful
Weapon.description: Whenever this +5 holy scimitar lands a hit on a target that is not good, it deals additional 2d6 fire damage. It grants its wielder the ability to cast mass heal spell once per day as a 17th level cleric.

Weapon.name: Thundercrack
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +5 agile shock scimitar.

Weapon.name: Divine Intervention
Weapon.description: This +4 holy flaming scimitar grants its wielder the ability to cast divine power spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Thundering Claw of the Bear God
Weapon.description:
Thundering Claw of the Bear God is a +4 Shock Thundering Scimitar. Any creature struck by a critical hit from this scimitar or its wielder's natural attack becomes the target of lightning, as per lightning storm spell (5d6 damage, 24 DC Reflex half).
All natural attacks from both the wielder of this scimitar and the wielder's animal companion have concussive and shocking modifier applied to them. If the wielder is wild shaped into a bear or if their animal companion is a bear, the sonic and electrical damage from their attacks is increased to 1d10.

Weapon.name: Faithful Companion
Weapon.description: This s+4 cutlass grants its wielder a +2 insight bonus to attack rolls against flat footed and flanked targets.

Weapon.name: Jolt
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +3 shock scismitar.

Weapon.name: Slicer
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 scimitar.

Weapon.name: The Way Out
Weapon.description: This +5 undead bane keen scythe allows its wielder to cast death ward spell at will.

Weapon.name: Glttonous Scythe
Weapon.description: This +5 scythe cures its wielder 1d4 HP each time sit successfully hits a living creature.

Weapon.name: Hand of Damnation
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 keen scythe.

Weapon.name: Eternal Conduit
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 scythe.

Weapon.name: Bow of the True World
Weapon.description: This +5 fey bane shortbow grants its wielder a +4 bonus on all saving throws against the abilities of fey.

Weapon.name: Whimsy
Weapon.description: Whenever this +3 shortbow lands a hit, it has a chance to cast hideous laughter on its target.

Weapon.name: Boneshard
Weapon.description: This +4 shortspear deals negative energy damage.

Weapon.name: Allslayer
Weapon.description: This +5 keen shortsword deals divine damage instead of physical, bypassing any damage reduction, resistance or immunity the target may possess. It also grants its wielder the ability to cast invisibility spell at will.

Weapon.name: Nature's Will
Weapon.description: This +2 vermin bane shortsword grants its wielder the ability to cast summon nature's ally ll spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Oath of the Sky
Weapon.description: This +5 sickle deals electricity damage instead of physical damage. Whenever its wielder casts call lightning or call lightning storm spell, it becomes empowered, as if using the Empower Spell feat.

Weapon.name: Oath of the Land
Weapon.description: This +5 sickle grants its wielder a shambling mound's ability to grab their foes.

Weapon.name: Chilly Midnight
Weapon.description: Whenever this +3 cold iron sickle lands a hit, its target has to succeed on a Fortitude saving throw (DC 17) or suffer 1d4 Dexterity damage.

Weapon.name: Avalanche
Weapon.description: This +3 frost halfling sling staff grants its wielder a+2 morale bonus to damage, and an ability to cast stone call spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Carefree Hunter
Weapon.description: This +2 halfling sling staff grants its wielder a +2 morale bonus to Dexterity, and a +5 luck bonus on Mobility skill checks.

Weapon.name: Vengeance of the Mark
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +2 giant bane sling staff.

Weapon.name: Utopia
Weapon.description: This +5 holy undead bane spear grants its wielder a +3 sacred bonus to Initiative checks, and the ablilty to cast good hope spell three times per day.

Weapon.name: Venom
Weapon.description: Whenever this +5 spear lands a hit, its target has to succeed on a Fortitude saving throw (DC27), or become poisoned with a poison that deals 1d3 damage to Constitution, Strength and Dexterity per round, and affected by acid that deals 2d12 damage per round.

Weapon.name: Dark Forest
Weapon.description: This +4 necrotic spear summons a friendly will-o'-wisp when it ends a life.

Weapon.name: Dystopia
Weapon.description: This +2 necrotic spear grants its wielder a +5 morale bonus to all Athletics checks, and the ability to cast inflict critical wounds spell three times per day.

Weapon.name: Longshank Bane
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +1 longshank bane spear.

Weapon.name: Sunbeam
Weapon.description: This +2 flaming spear grants its wielder the ability to cast searing light spell twice per day.

Weapon.name: Spiked Defender
Weapon.description: This +1 frost spear grants its wielder a +1 shield bonus to AC, and deals additional 1d3 cold damage.

Weapon.name: Black Star
Weapon.description: Whenever this +5 unholy starknife lands a critical hit, it has a chance to cast either slay living, confusion or crushing despair spell on the target.

Weapon.name: Tangled Claws
Weapon.description: Whenever this +4 feybane starknife lands a hit, it has a chance to entangle the target.

Weapon.name: Neverending Journey
Weapon.description: Whenever this +5 holy starknife lands a hit, it dazzles the target for 1d4 rounds, and has a chance to cast blindness spell (Fortitude save, DC21) on it.

Weapon.name: Thwarter
Weapon.description: This +5 sacrificial tongi has a chance to stun creatures of evil alignment on critical hits and grants its wielder the ablilty to cast chain lightning spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Destroyer of the Corrupted
Weapon.description: This weapon is a mithral tongi +5

Weapon.name: Nature's Wrath
Weapon.description: This +5 trident does additional 1d12 damage against aberrations, constructs, humanoids, ousiders and undead. On a successful hit, it makes the target vulnerable to electricity for 1 minute.

Weapon.name: Bound Thunder
Weapon.description: This +1 shock trident grants its wielder the ability to cast lightning bolt spell once per day as a 10th level wizard.

Weapon.name: Twin Crystals
Weapon.description: This +5 agile keen two-bladed sword deals force damage instead of physical damage.

Weapon.name: Fireborn Warhammer
Weapon.description: This +4 flaming warhammer holds three small fire elementals that can be summoned once per day.

Weapon.name: Preacher's Warhammer
Weapon.description: This +4 holy warhammer grants its wielder the ability to cast inspiring recovery spell once per day.

Weapon.name: Solid Strategy
Weapon.description: This +5 holy warhammer grants its wielder the ability to move without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Weapon.name: Chaos Hammer
Weapon.description:
Whenever this +4 anarchic warhammer lands a critical hit, it applies the effect of Touch of chaos ability to the target.
Touch of chaos: You imbue the target with chaos. For the next round, anytime they rolls a d20, they must roll twice and take the less favorable result.

Weapon.name: Noble Warhammer
Weapon.description: This weapon is a +3 warhammer.

Weapon.name: Warhammer of Hatred
Weapon.description: This +1 warhammer is particularly efficient against the ancestral enemies of the dwarven race. Its damage is increased by 1d6 against orcs and goblins, and by 2d6 against giants.
